QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_clr_contractor.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_contractor where a.object_id = 5017904 and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_contractor.id UNION select odf_ca_clr_contractor.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_contractor where a.object_id in (5017906) and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_contractor.odf_parent_id
